long_description: Sun protection and soft organic cotton/spandex make the REI Greenlake T-shirt one you can rely on for just about any activity, any day of the week. Made of an organic cotton/spandex blend, this cotton jersey offers stretch, breathability and next-to-skin comfort; and it's easy care as well. Fabric provides UPF 50+ sun protection, shielding skin from harmful ultraviolet rays. 2x2 ribs at neckline binding, cuffs and side panels add visual interest. REI Greenlake T-shirt offers a classic fit.
short_description: Sun protection and soft organic cotton/spandex make the REI Greenlake T-shirt one you can rely on for just about any activity, any day of the week.
